titles.title: He Died For Me That I Might Live (easy, nice,

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Jesus my Lord and Savior Help me to fully follow Thee In life and death and loving service As Thou hast lived and died for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He died for me that I might live I live for Him who died My life my love to Him I give Jesus the Crucified{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He died for me that I might die To Satan self and sin O death so deep O life so high Help me to enter in{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He lives for me that I may live As spotless e'en as He Savior to me Thy nature give And live Thy life in me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He lives for me that I may give His love to hearts that pine Let me like Him for others live And trace His steps divine{/lang-eng}
